fvs.taxe.actor

Class TrainActor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Widget
        • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Image
          • fvs.taxe.actor.TrainActor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout

    public class TrainActor
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Image
    This class is a type of image specifically for creating Actors for Trains.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean facingLeft
      The direction of the train.

      The height of a TrainActor in pixels.

      The train the TrainActor corresponds to.
      static int width
      The width of a TrainActor in pixels.
